participant_1.background:
I do my best to keep up with my family, although it's hard to stay connected with everyone when you're working all the time.
I don't care much about the weather, as long as my dog is happy.
I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
I had to learn how to cook without shrimp because of my shellfish allergy.
i will be on bed rest for the next 5 months.

participant_2.background:
I had a party with my friends and we played arm wrestling.
i watch basketball.
my mom went crazy when i was three and i have not seen her since.
My laundry schedule is based on the amount of running I do that week.
unfortunately , my family lives across the country from me.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing alright, thanks for asking! I'm on bed rest for the next five months, so I'm a little bored. But I'm getting to do some reading, so that's nice.
Oh no! What happened?
I had an accident, and I'm going to be recovering for a while. But I'm doing okay, and I'm excited to get back to normal life.
That's good to hear! I'm sure you'll be back to your old self in no time.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to play music, and I'm also a big fan of basketball.
That's cool! I used to play basketball in high school, but I'm not very good at it.
Oh, that's too bad. But I'm sure you're better than you think.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what's your favorite basketball team?
I'm a big fan of the Golden State Warriors.
Oh, nice! I'm a fan of the Los Angeles Lakers.
Oh, that's cool! I'm not a big fan of the Lakers, but I respect their history.
Thanks! I'm a big fan of LeBron James.
Oh, he's amazing! I'm a big fan of Steph Curry.
Oh, he's so good!
Yeah, he's one of the best players in the league.
Yeah, he's definitely up there.
So, what are you looking forward to doing after you get out of bed rest?
I'm looking forward to playing music again, and I'm also looking forward to going back to work.
Oh, that's great! I'm sure you'll be able to do all of those things soon.
Thanks! I hope so.
You're welcome!
